nodes.text: Nopsin was a planet in the Mid Rim.
Nopsin was the third world colonized by the Tren. During the Galactic Civil War, the planet joined the Empire and agreed to certain non-expansion laws.
The Tren Opit-Wenbruh sympathized with the Tren resistance on Nopsin, but he never joined due to the sense of duty he felt toward the Nopsin military, of which he was a member.
